91 static void MmwDemo_hwaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
92 {
93  /* Initialize the HWA */
94  HWA_init();
95 }
96 
107 void MmwDemo_edmaInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
108 {
109  uint8_t edmaNumInstances, inst;
110  int32_t errorCode;
111 
112  edmaNumInstances = EDMA_getNumInstances();
113  for (inst = 0; inst < edmaNumInstances; inst++)
114  {
115  errorCode = EDMA_init(inst);
116  if (errorCode != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
117  {
118  //System_printf ("Debug: EDMA instance %d initialization returned error %d\n", errorCode);
119  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
120  return;
121  }
122  }
123 
124  memset(&obj->EDMA_errorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_errorInfo));
125  memset(&obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo, 0, sizeof(obj->EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo));
126 }
127 
135 void MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle, EDMA_errorInfo_t *errorInfo)
136 {
137  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_errorInfo = *errorInfo;
138  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
139 }
140 
148 void MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn(EDMA_Handle handle,
149  EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo_t *errorInfo)
150 {
151  gMmwDssMCB.dataPathObj.EDMA_transferControllerErrorInfo = *errorInfo;
152  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
153 }
154 
166 static void MmwDemo_hwaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj, SOC_Handle socHandle)
167 {
168  int32_t errCode;
169 
170  /* Open the HWA Instance */
171  obj->hwaHandle = HWA_open(0, socHandle, &errCode);
172  if (obj->hwaHandle == NULL)
173  {
174  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the HWA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
175  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
176  return;
177  }
178 }
179 
190 static void MmwDemo_hwaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
191 {
192  int32_t errCode;
193 
194  /* Close the HWA Instance */
195  errCode = HWA_close(obj->hwaHandle);
196  if (errCode != 0)
197  {
198  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
199  return;
200  }
201 }
202 
213 static void MmwDemo_edmaOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
214 {
215  int32_t errCode;
216  EDMA_instanceInfo_t edmaInstanceInfo;
217  EDMA_errorConfig_t errorConfig;
218  int32_t edmaCCIdx;
219 
220  for (edmaCCIdx = 0; edmaCCIdx < EDMA_NUM_CC; edmaCCIdx++)
221  {
222  obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] = EDMA_open(edmaCCIdx, &errCode, &edmaInstanceInfo);
223 
224  if (obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx] == NULL)
225  {
226  //System_printf("Error: Unable to open the EDMA Instance err:%d\n",errCode);
227  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
228  return;
229  }
230 
231  errorConfig.isConfigAllEventQueues = true;
232  errorConfig.isConfigAllTransferControllers = true;
233  errorConfig.isEventQueueThresholdingEnabled = true;
234  errorConfig.eventQueueThreshold = EDMA_EVENT_QUEUE_THRESHOLD_MAX;
235  errorConfig.isEnableAllTransferControllerErrors = true;
236  errorConfig.callbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_errorCallbackFxn;
237  errorConfig.transferControllerCallbackFxn = MmwDemo_EDMA_transferControllerErrorCallbackFxn;
238  if ((errCode = EDMA_configErrorMonitoring(obj->edmaHandle[edmaCCIdx], &errorConfig)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
239  {
240  //System_printf("Error: EDMA_configErrorMonitoring() failed with errorCode = %d\n", errCode);
241  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
242  return;
243  }
244  }
245 }
246 
257 void MmwDemo_edmaClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
258 {
259  EDMA_close(obj->edmaHandle);
260 }
261 
272 void MmwDemo_dataPathInit(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
273 {
274  memset(obj, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_DataPathObj));
275 
276  /* Initialize HWA */
277  MmwDemo_hwaInit(obj);
278 
279  /* Initialize EDMA */
280  MmwDemo_edmaInit(obj);
281 }
282 
293 void MmwDemo_dataPathOpen(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
294 {
295  /*****************************************************************************
296  * Open HWA, EDMA drivers instances
297  *****************************************************************************/
298  MmwDemo_hwaOpen(obj, gMmwDssMCB.socHandle);
299  MmwDemo_edmaOpen(obj);
300 }
301 
312 void MmwDemo_dataPathClose(MmwDemo_DataPathObj *obj)
313 {
314  /* DPC close */
315  DPM_deinit(obj->objDetDpmHandle);
316 
317  /* Close HWA driver */
318  MmwDemo_hwaClose(obj);
319 
320  /* Close EDMA driver */
321  MmwDemo_edmaClose(obj);
322 }
